comments: Adebayo (MIA) legally contests Hayward's (CHA) driving shot attempt.  Any "high-five" contact after the release is considered incidental.
Adebayo (MIA) does not touch the ball with two hands during his dribble as he briefly fumbles the ball.
Biyombo (CHA) jumps vertically and absorbs the contact from Adebayo (MIA) by collapsing his forearm into his body, while legally contesting the driving shot attempt.
Following the pick, Graham (CHA) and Adebayo (MIA) engage and disengage and the contact is marginal.
Ariza (MIA) briefly places a resting arm to Graham's (CHA) front and the contact is marginal as it does not affect his SQBR.
Butler (MIA) legally contests Rozier's (CHA) jump shot attempt and any foot to foot contact after Graham returns to the floor is deemed incidental.
During the rebound, Herro (MIA) makes clean ball contact to dislodge the ball from Hayward (CHA) out of bounds.
Butler (MIA) legally contests Rozier's (CHA) jump shot attempt.
Martin (CHA) maintains a legal guarding position and absorbs the contact from Adebayo (MIA) at the end of his drive. Adebayo gathers and takes a legal two steps before elevating to make his pass.

Bridges (CHA) maintains a legal guarding position on Butler (MIA) and cleanly deflects the pass away. The replay center confirms the call on the court of the ball being last touched by Charlotte before going out of bounds.
Ariza (MIA) releases the throw-in within five seconds.
Adebayo (MIA) establishes himself in a screening position in Bridges' (CHA) path and absorbs the contact during the dribble hand-off.
Ariza (MIA) commits a take foul on Monk (CHA).
Ariza (MIA) commits a take foul on Hayward (CHA).
Ariza (MIA) does not release the throw-in within five seconds.
After the screen, Martin (CHA) and Adebayo (MIA) engage and disengage and the contact is marginal.
Biyombo (CHA) maintains a legal guarding position on Robinson (MIA) off ball and cleanly deflects the pass out of bounds.

Ariza (MIA) makes contact to Rozier's (CHA) arm and pulls it away from the ball, which affects his ability to cleanly retrieve the inbounds pass. After Rozier gains possession, any contact with Ariza and Iguodala (MIA) before they dislodge the ball out of bounds is deemed marginal.
Butler (MIA) commits a take foul on Graham (CHA).
Biyombo (CHA) legally contests and cleanly blocks Robinson's (MIA) jump shot attempt.
